html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09972021-12-03,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectCanada-French Republic Concerning the Provision of Mutual Logistic Support between the Canadian Armed Forces and the French Armed Forces ** Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the AGREEMENT between the Government of Canada and the Government of the FRENCH REPUBLIC CONCERNING THE PROVISIONS OF MUTUAL LOGISTIC SUPPORT BETWEEN THE CANADIAN ARMED FORCES AND THE FRENCH ARMED FORCES; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement.
AttachmentsAttachment
